name: Interactive Mey
description:
A Hideo Kojima demongang Game. How many dollars do you have to spend on this game? $300?? $500?? NO IT'S COMPLETELY FREE!!!

Never be alone again with Mey as your virtual companion!

v0.1a Features:

- Headpat (Hold left click above Mey)

- Poke

Engine: Godot

Character: Caleblolag

Sprites: demongang

Programming: demongang
